articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as England play the Netherlands in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: World Cup: England v Netherlands - clips, radio & text

articles.description: Reaction to Tuesday's Champions League games as Manchester City book their place in the knockout stages.
articles.title: Champions League reaction: Man City reach last 16, Newcastle and Celtic lose

articles.description: Erling Haaland is so good, he now has players asking for his shirt at half-time.
articles.title: 'I'd ask for his jersey myself' - Haaland firing Man City to history

articles.description: Watch as England's Joe Root is bowled through his legs by Netherland's Logan van Beek for 28 in their Cricket World Cup match in Pune.
articles.title: 'He's been nutmegged!' - Root bowled through his legs by Van Beek

articles.description: Saudi Pro League champions Al-Ittihad have sacked former Tottenham manager Nuno Espirito Santo after a run of poor results.
articles.title: Former Spurs boss Nuno sacked by Al-Ittihad

articles.description: Wayne Barnes says people "don't see the human side of refereeing" as he describes the abuse he and his family faced following the World Cup final.
articles.title: 'People don't see the human side of refereeing'

articles.description: England are a "sinking ship" and players need to "take responsibility" for a poor World Cup, says former captain Eoin Morgan.
articles.title: England are a 'sinking ship' - ex-captain Morgan

articles.description: Gymnast Laura Gallagher talks about how becoming a mother has changed her as an athlete.
articles.title: 'We have an athlete mums WhatsApp group'

articles.description: Tottenham forward Brennan Johnson returns from injury but captain Aaron Ramsey is still out as Wales face Armenia and Turkey for a place at Euro 2024.
articles.title: Johnson back for Wales' decisive Euro qualifiers

articles.description: Where does Australia batter Glenn Maxwell's stunning 201 not out to beat Afghanistan rank among the greatest men's ODI innings?
articles.title: Is Maxwell's 'miracle' the greatest men's ODI innings?
